about.p: Below we will answer why evacuation is inexpensive with us. Our services are without intermediaries, so prices are low. The cost of ordering the transportation of a passenger car starts from 5000 AMD. We evacuate special equipment from 7000 AMD. Transportation of a jeep, minivan or gazelle will also cost inexpensively - from 7,000 drams.
about.p2: The price in marz is calculated by agreement. This makes transportation transparent and cheap for the client. The operator makes accurate calculations and reports the final cost before calling. The price in marz is calculated by agreement. This makes transportation transparent and cheap for the client. The operator makes accurate calculations and reports the final cost before calling.
about.li1: in the case of locked wheels, the price increases,
about.li2: change of route in the city, the price increases,
about.li4: downtime due to the client's fault 2500 drams for 30 minutes,
